column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last year , I was outside working in the garden when I realized that my front yard would like much nicer if I planted a tree to provide it with a little shade .
#text=I went to the gardeners store down the street and pick up some seeds to plant my tree .
#text=I decided on a maple tree as that would look nice and make a perfect amount of shade for my front lawn .
#text=I dug a small hole where I wanted to plant the tree and put the seeds in place .
#text=Every few weeks I noticed that the tree started to grow more and more as I provided it with the correct amount of water and nutrients .
#text=After about 12 months the tree I had planted was nearly fully grown and looked wonderful next to me garden .
#text=I was very satisfied with the entire situation and love the idea of plants growing from the ground .
